	and return the result as a string.
	If shift > number of digits, return digits reversed.
	>>> circularShift(12, 1)
	"21"
	>>> circularShift(12, 2)
	"12"
	*/
const circularShift = (x, shift) => {
	s = x.toString();
	if (shift > s.length)
		return s.split('').reverse().join('');
	return s.substr(0, shift) + s.substr(shift, s.length - shift);
}
